game.name: Batman™: Arkham Knight - WayneTech Track Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 이 최첨단 웨인테크 테마 레이스 트랙에서 핸들을 잡고 당신의 스킬을 시험하십시오.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Test your skills behind the wheel with these two cutting edge WayneTech themed racetracks.
